message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it could really benefit you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am still looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Could we possibly meet at $12,500?
